topics.body:
_In my experience, changing the battery for a smoke detector is a pretty easy task to manage._

The hard part is that it's on the ceiling, and if you don't have a ladder, it's gonna be tricky to get it done and put it back in place, even if you are fairly tall and have enough reach towards the thing.

And the challenge intensifies if you don't know where the beeping is coming from.
